    • Cocktailnight

    Do you like drinking cocktails and would like to find out how to mix them yourself? Then come to StuZ (CAB F21 ) on the 23. of October at 6:15pm. We will mix some well-known and also less well-known cocktails together and learn how to use the equipment. Of course, you also have the opportunity to give free reign to your creativity to put together the best creation of the evening. All this for only CHF 15.-, which you can pay by Twint or cash.

    Please login to continue.
    Oct. 23, 2025, 6:15 p.m. Duration: 4:00:00

# Cocktailnight
![](https://minio-redzone.vseth.ethz.ch:443/vmp-prod.vmpsite-s3bucket/posters/_Cocktailkurs_HS25_2025-10-23_happy_hour_3_.png?AWSAccessKeyId=vmp-prod.vmpsite-s3bucket&Signature=sP5rgbbk%2FeK6T39U9v0NzAV%2Fgp4%3D&Expires=1760899872)
Do you like drinking cocktails and would like to find out how to mix them yourself? Then come to StuZ (CAB F21 ) on the 23. of October at 6:15pm. We will mix some well-known and also less well-known cocktails together and learn how to use the equipment. Of course, you also have the opportunity to give free reign to your creativity to put together the best creation of the evening. All this for only CHF 15.-, which you can pay by Twint or cash.
Please login to continue. 
Oct. 23, 2025, 6:15 p.m. Duration: 4:00:00
© 2023 VMP [ Impressum](https://www.vmp.ethz.ch/impressum/)

    • A glimpse into tech consulting

    Ever wondered what it’s like to work as a tech consultant?

    Join Lukas Möller, Co-Teamlead and Cloud & Modern Workplace Consultant at Cyberfy Consulting and former ETH student, for an insightful session into the world of IT consulting.

    You’ll get a glimpse into the consultant’s role and discover how people from diverse backgrounds find their way into this field. You’ll also learn what “Modern Work” really means for companies today — not just as a cultural shift but as a deep technological transformation. A real-world project example will illustrate how these concepts are brought to life in practice.

    There will be plenty of time for questions and discussion during and after the session!

    Please login to continue.
    Oct. 21, 2025, 6:15 p.m. Duration: 2:00:00
    © 2023 VMP Impressum

    Grave Rave To kick off the spooky season, the student associations SMW, VMP, VeBiS, GESO, and VCS are hosting an event at CAB. We'll be celebrating from 9 p.m. to 3 a.m. Put on your spooky outfits and come on by. https://eventfrog.ch/de/p/party/studentenparty/grave-rave-4-0-7375905746767076276.html

    If you don't want to pay entry and would like to support us in organizing these events, sign up for our helper list! https://forms.gle/Qw5twwmx5bRG1GXb8

    We will be entertained by several DJs, e.g. Lenny insta: lenny_necio, dj_miam.m & panos. We are also looking for more DJs to provide more musical variety. If you are interested in DJing, please contact jkeuning@ethz.ch

    There will also be a box office, but advance tickets are cheaper! We look forward to seeing you there.

    Keine Anmeldung beim VMP nötig
    Oct. 24, 2025, 9 p.m. Duration: 6:00:00
    © 2023 VMP Impressum
